title: New China-Nexus APT Group IcePeony Targeting Asian Nations
summary: IcePeony employs sophisticated attack methods such as SQL injection, webshells, and a unique malware known as "IceCache" to achieve its goals. The group's primary objective seems to be credential theft.

title: Transparent Tribe APT Group’s New Arsenal: Mythic Poseidon, Linux, and C2 Takedown
summary: The 8220 Gang, a China-based cyber threat group identified in 2018, has introduced two new malware variants, Hadooken and K4Spreader. These sophisticated strains target vulnerable cloud systems to hijack resources for cryptomining.

title: Cloudflare Warns of India-Linked Hackers Targeting South and East Asian Entities
summary: SloppyLemming has been active since at least July 2021 and has targeted the government, law enforcement, energy, education, telecommunications, and technology sectors in countries such as Pakistan, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, China, Nepal, and Indonesia.

title: India Needs Better Cybersecurity for Space Systems
summary: Dr. Sreedhara Panicker Somanath, chairman of the Indian Space Research Organization, emphasized the importance of cybersecurity for the entire system during the recent inauguration of a cybersecurity training center.

title: Critical GeoServer Flaw Enabling Global Hack Campaigns
summary: The flaw in GeoServer, tracked as CVE-2024-36401 and with a CVSS score of 9.8, was swiftly capitalized on by hackers who launched campaigns using botnet families and cryptominers to spread malicious tools like Goreverse, a reverse proxy server.

title: India's Critical Infrastructure Suffers Spike in Cyberattacks
summary: India is experiencing a rise in cyberattacks on its critical infrastructure, particularly in the financial and government sectors, prompting the Reserve Bank of India to issue warnings about the need for enhanced cybersecurity measures.

title: MegaMedusa, RipperSec’s Public Web DDoS Attack Tool
summary: RipperSec, a pro-Palestinian hacktivist group based in Malaysia, has released MegaMedusa, a publicly available Web DDoS attack tool that simplifies launching large-scale DDoS attacks.

title: Update: Ransomware Attack on Indian Payment System Traced Back to Jenkins Bug
summary: A recent ransomware attack on Indian payment systems has been traced back to a vulnerability in the widely used Jenkins automation system. The attack targeted a digital payment system used by many Indian banks.

title: Feds Seize Radar/Dispossessor Ransomware Gang Servers in US and Europe
summary: Federal authorities have seized servers belonging to the Radar/Dispossessor ransomware gang in the U.S. and Europe. The FBI dismantled dozens of servers linked to the group, which is believed to have ties to the LockBit ransomware enterprise.

title: Ransomware Attack On Service Provider Hits 300 Small Banks Across India
summary: The attack targeted C-Edge Technologies, a provider of banking systems for these banks. As a precaution, the National Payment Corporation of India (NPCI) has isolated these banks from the broader payment network to contain the attack.
